item.title: New Hope
item.description:
Hey there! I have to decide that I will never learn web programming anymore. I never set my target to become a web developer, programmer, or to be UI/UX designer. That is because my job as an IT Support had never related into it.

I’ve been working as an IT Support for 5 years more now. I have spent about 4.5 years working on banking services (ATM, CRM, EDC, and related devices and users) in the previous company. After I passed a probationary period at my current company, I realized that I need an improvement.

This will be a new hope for me to survive and continue this journey. I hope, I will.

item.title: First Post
item.description:
Hey there! This is my first post using Hugo. Hugo is static site generators to help you build website easily than before. I ran this website locally and publish it using Github Pages. I would like to blogging again like I used to say, “Let’s Start it again!”.

I changed my theme. Here is the old one:
